channel.title: Li Lab on Li Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Li Lab on Li Lab

item.title: Nuclei Multiplexing with Barcoded Antibodies for Single-Nucleus Genomics
Our nucleus hashing and DemuxEM paper is published in Nature Communications today!
The Li Lab website is created!
scCloud
item.description:
scCloud is a cloud-based single-cell and single-nucleus RNA-Seq data analysis framework that is scalable, cost-effective, able to process a variety of data types and easily accessible to biologists. It is developed based on Google Cloud Platform and Broad Institute’s FireCloud and Terra services, and is publicly accessible. scCloud source codes contain two components. The first component consists of WDL (Workflow Description Language) files and Docker files that are required for workflow execution and listed here. The second component is a Python package scCloudPy for analyzing gene-count matrices.

Click here to read scCloud documentation

Publications:

  • Manuscript in preparation.

item.title: scCloudPy
item.description:
scCloudPy is a python package that takes gene-count matrices as input and performs a wide range of analyses, such as quality control, highly variable gene selection, batch correction, principal component analysis (PCA), k-nearest neighbor graph construction, diffusion map, clustering, t-SNE-, UMAP-, and force-directed layout-based visualization, differential expression, cluster-specific marker detection and marker-based cell type annotation.

Click here to read scCloudPy documentation

Publications:

  • Manuscript in preparation.

item.title: PROBer
item.description:
PROBer is the first unified probabilistic framework for the analysis of a diverse set of sequencing-based ‘toeprinting’ assays. These assays are used to probe RNA secondary structure (DMS/SHAPE-Seq), detect epitranscriptomic mark (Pseudo-Seq), or identify RNA-protein interaction (iCLIP/eCLIP), which are important to understanding post-transcriptional gene regulation from all aspects.

Click here to view PROBer website

Publications:

  • PROBer paper

item.title: PROBer Provides a General Toolkit for Analyzing Sequencing-Based Toeprinting Assays

DETONATE (DE novo TranscriptOme rNa-seq Assembly with or without the Truth Evaluation)
item.description:
A de novo transcriptome assembly evaluation package, which contains two components, RSEM-EVAL and REF-EVAL. Bo developed the RSEM-EVAL component.

Publications:

  • DETONATE paper

item.title: Evaluation of de novo Transcriptome Assemblies from RNA-Seq Data
De novo Transcript Sequence Reconstruction from RNA-seq using the Trinity Platform for Reference Generation and Analysis
RSEM: Accurate Transcript Quantification from RNA-Seq Data with or without a Reference Genome
CSEM (ChIP-Seq multi-read allocation using Expectation-Maximization)
item.description:
As one of the first ChIP-Seq multi-mapping read allocators, CSEM allows multi-reads to be utilized by peak callers.

Publications:

  • CSEM paper
